attributes.action: To create a Datum below which the Aremed Forces are not allowed to fall.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A datum must be established which lays out the absolute minimum manning and equipment levels below which the Armed Forces must not be allowed to be dropped or cut by any government of whatever persuation.  This level must be set out by the Senior Officers of all brnches of the Army, Navy and Air Force.This must be established to maintain the Soverienty and fine Traditions of our wonderful country
